column1: Uncontrolled data used in OS command
column2: Using user-supplied data in an OS command, without neutralizing special elements, can make code vulnerable to command injection.
column4: This argument to an OS command is derived from [["user input (string read by fgets)"|"relative:///main.c:11:9:11:15"]], dangerously concatenated into [["strcat output argument"|"relative:///main.c:15:10:15:20"]], and then passed to system(__command).
